Title: Presenting Caroline's Corner!
Text: Dear @,^On Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays, Caroline will now be running a shop with more gardening and floral supplies, including out of season stock, at the front corner of the store. Please stop by and see what's on offer!^^From,^Your local shopkeeps at the General Store

Title: Letter From Elliot
Text: @,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... Everyone either seems to be in a mad hurry or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... My stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Sincerely, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%

Title: Letter From Elliot 2
Text: @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^Let's hope the bookstore is prepared for it.^^-Sincerely, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%

Title: Letter From Elliot 3
Text: My dear friend @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your friend from the beach Elliott, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon.^^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%

Title: Letter From Elliot 4
Text: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've travelled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where a friend waits:^Their little home beside the pond^^-Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%

Title: Letter From Elliot 5
Text: My friend,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and hear what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning home... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace stoked by an engine, and my little that smells of sea salt. There's a lot to enjoy!^^-Sincerely, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%

Title: Letter From Elliot 6
Text: Dearest @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to my cozy cabin, our talks on the beach, and the occasional hermit crab.^^See you soon!^-Sincerely, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%

Title: For the Diamond
Text: Thanks again for the diamond! I know they're expensive and hard to get and I couldn't make up for something like that easily. Hope you like what I made for you!^^Love,^Emily
